entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southeast 60 gusting to 80. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
